channel.title: Chuck Norris Jokes
channel.description:
My friend at school told me these one day and there just so funny, well, some of them :) Sense they're funny and i want to see how many he laughs at, please post some good ones you know. Note: This isnt a game.
Few i have heard: - When chuck jumps into a pool of water, he doesn't get wet, the water gets chuck norris. - Everyone can pee on the floor, chuck norris can shit on the ceiling.
All i really know atm Please post some.

item.title: Chuck Norris Jokes
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

OWNER 2007:

You know, most of these jokes that people posted just googled chuck norris jokes, went to www.chucknorrisfacts.com or something and copied and pasted stuff from there.

We established that in the first post, there are to many dumb ones and takes forever to find good ones

Read full topic

item.title: Chuck Norris Jokes
item.dc:creator: @Algas Algas
item.description:
@Algas wrote:

When Chuck Norris goes to sleep he puts his nightlamp on. Not because he is afraid of dark, its because dark is afraid of Chuck Norris.

Read full topic

item.title: Chuck Norris Jokes

item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

The Great Wall of China was originally created to keep Chuck Norris out. It failed miserably.

item.title: Chuck Norris Jokes
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:23, topic:166108”][quote author=Frell link=topic=225247.msg1942552#msg1942552 date=1198214945]

Chuck norris had a starring contest with a statue, he remains undefeated.

*Staring lol.

wouldnt that be like, staring in a movie?

…
That was a failure of epic proportions.

starring isnt red in firefox spellcheck, i even checked youtube to see if it would correct me, i saw titles that said “starring contest”
[/quote]

red is suppose to be read.

and to stare at someone is staring not starring.[/quote]
My “a” key has a red pepper jammed underneath it (laptop)

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:25, topic:166108”][quote author=Frell link=topic=225247.msg1941152#msg1941152 date=1198140815]
My friend at school told me these one day and there just so funny, well, some of them
Sense they’re funny and i want to see how many he laughs at, please post some good ones you know.
Note: This isnt a game.

Few i have heard:

  • When chuck jumps into a pool of water, he doesn’t get wet, the water gets chuck norris.
  • Everyone can pee on the floor, chuck norris can shit on the ceiling.

All i really know atm Please post some.
[/quote]

Bro i heard the same exact jokes, do you go to braddock senior High?[/quote]
Im in 8th grade, and no.

Read full topic

item.title: Chuck Norris Jokes
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

You “sea,” this is the problem with FF spellcheck. As long as “theirs” no “read,” it’s fine, and “spelt” correctly.

Read full topic

Chuck Norris doesn’t dodge bullets, bullets dodge Chuck Norris.

item.title: Chuck Norris Jokes
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:7, topic:166108”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=225247.msg1941186#msg1941186 date=1198142480]
Chuck Norris ordered a BigMac from MacDonalds, and got one.

Haha I don’t know why but that’s my favorite.
[/quote]
I really lol’d at how literal that was.[/quote]
That’s why I find it so funny.
